website_summaries.verdict: From one of the biggest brands in disc golf comes a lightweight, foldable basket that is easy to transport.
pros: If you are looking for a basket to throw in the trunk of your car, this is your best bet
The narrow profile of the chains makes it easy to practice precision shots, and the flag increases visibility to allow you to set up a small backyard hole
cons: A few customers received broken parts

customer_reviews.title: great quality, lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: after reviewing all the available travel holes, this one was the best rated, and now I can see why! gave this as a gift to my husband and he loves it so much! the chains and everything are made of quality materials. the set up/and take down are super easy/quick! it even comes with a carrying case! if we had a bigger yard I would buy more of these! if you are questioning if this is worth the price, or if you should get a cheaper one, I say get this one because I can tell it will last longer and was worth the extra money compared to the cheaper options out there!
customer_reviews.author: happyhooper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Basket!
customer_reviews.text: You know the name. You know the quality. If you're looking for an awesome basket to take to the park or practice putting in the yard, then look no further! The carry bag is very durable and the flag on top is a nice touch! My only gripe would be the lack of a second chain layer, so some puts might go through this basket that would definitely get caught in a Mach3 or Mach5, but it forces you put well and have good technique. This is the price you pay for mobility, as an extra chain layer would make this thing too heavy for a day at the park.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Been using this all summer, and have taken it ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this all summer, and have taken it camping twice. I even brought it to the family reunion for something to do. It's stood up to weather, being in the back of my truck for the whole summer, and a toddler grabbing at it. The target area is a little smaller than a normal play basket but it has helped my aim. I wish i bought two
customer_reviews.author: John Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Basket
customer_reviews.text: This basket is awesome! I bought it for my husband who took up disc golf. It closes up and is portable just like the camp chairs. It’s great to bring to a field or for in your backyard. It’s very good quality and we’ve had it a while now. I’m writing a review because I am on here to buy another one for my Dad. Great for any disc golf enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Ready to Go Right Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: The diameter of the chains is narrower than expected...and the diameter of the basket is wider than expected. But it's a great basket. Lightweight, and seemingly durable. Have already gotten hours of fun out of it. No assembly required. Comes with a travel bag. c
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: High quality.  Easy up and down.
customer_reviews.text: Easy up. Easy down. Reasonably light. Comes with a wind flag and stakes to hold it down on windy days. Catches discs great and is a perfect practice target for the back yard. May be a bit smaller than a normal basket and has less chains but that will help you work on your putt.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Rotolo

customer_reviews.title: Best anniversary gift! Lightweight, perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a anniversary gift to my boyfriend (and to me really). We both disc golf but with our busy schedules it’s tough to regularly go to the courses. This is the perfect remedy for keeping our skills sharp. Really portable, a little heavier than a camping chair. Is sturdy enough for windy conditions and the chains are great for catching discs. Got this one in yellow for easy visibility. We love it so much that it’s always in the trunk of the car for impromptu putting practice. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Fathers Day and he loves it. Very quick to put up and take down, lightweight, and it's very sturdy - even without being staked down (which is an option, as it comes with stakes and has rings on the legs) it barely moves when a disc hits it. Extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great basket with only one flaw
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how easy it was to setup and put back into the carrying bag, it truly does setup in seconds. The chains seem kinda light and with there only being one row of chains, I thought there would be an issue with disc retention, but not all! The only issue I can point out is the top of the basket never sits flat and is always lopsided which makes it look kinda wonky and cheap. Other than that its a great basket for the price, the portability is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: This so much fun! I love how portable it is! It comes with its own carrying bag, like those you see on folding camping chairs. Easy to unfold. There's a catch that clicks in place once you've opened it. (Photo). It also has rings on the feet so you can anchor it. Out of the box and ready for play in less than 5 minutes (at least that's how it felt). Threw from about 25ft or less. Haven't aimed at it from distance yet.
customer_reviews.author: JPR Live

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves it. It’s easy to set up and take down. And the carrying case makes it super convenient to travel with. It’s very sturdy and replicates the outdoor version quite well. There were other cheaper options but I’m glad I went with this one. I feel like it will bring him enjoyment for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Nice Portable Basket
customer_reviews.text: Awesome portable basket! Could have better instructions for setup and take down, but over all worked great. The top could be more level once setup, kinda uneven, however the flag was visible.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: a must have for passionate discers
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this thing got it for my birthday and its very heavy duty , have never needed the stakes but nice to have, chains are heavy and able to add more no problem , flag is a nice touch and great for back yard putting or setting up your own custom course where you can't put permanent holes
customer_reviews.author: Dan J

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to transport and assemble but frame could be stronger
customer_reviews.text: Product broke after a couple of light uses. The metal around the bolt that connects the legs to the body. Still usable but not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Beherndt

customer_reviews.title: Great basket, just long and heavy.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a portable basket to take camping and around locally to avoid crowded courses. This is a nice option but is longer and heavier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I mean, take it with ya... stable quality construction.. heavier chains would be nice.. but darn good product
customer_reviews.author: John Hasapes

customer_reviews.title: Great travel basket
customer_reviews.text: This basket is pretty awesome if you're interested in portability. The quality seems good and it is definitely easy to transport (only takes a minute to setup or put away). The only reason why I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is I would have liked heavier chains on the basket, you do get more spit-outs than a traditional basket. But if portability is your main concern this is a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! It's perfect for on-the-go practice or impromptu gaming. My husband and I keep this in our trunk and stop at various parks or open fields and can play at our leisure. The product is made well and very easy to set up and take down. I did not have to use any stakes to keep it from moving, either. Highly recommend this to people that need to practice before they play at a course or just want to be able to start a game at their leisure.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Stuck

customer_reviews.title: if your looking to practice at home this is the one for you
customer_reviews.text: if you're looking for a portable discs catcher this is the one to buy very reasonably priced has a bag to make carrying easier the bag is like the kind like chairs have so it's over the shoulder ,, would definitely buy again so when they practice the can throw from both sides of the field, woods.
customer_reviews.author: Bad kitty

customer_reviews.title: Great product and Excellent quality. - Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, much better they I thought it would be. construction and material quality is excellent. Chains are very heavy and the canvas material is bright and durable. We have been having a great time playing with the Diskcather. I would highly recommend this product who wants a quality and fun game. COmes with a nice carry/storage bag and folds up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Valvano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Can hit it with a disc from150 ft and it doesn't budge, with no stakes holding it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is borderline perfect, pretty light and about the size of a folding camping chair. Chains are heavy and stops all putters thrown at it so far. My only con for this is that the top isn't held down so if struck directly it'll pivot up.
customer_reviews.author: chong

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and take with you
customer_reviews.text: Great product and our grandson really likes it. We got it as a Christmas gift and it was a hit for this 10 year old. Very easy to put away and set up, which really helped to encourage play. We ordered the yellow one but a red one appeared when we opened the box, which was mentioned in the ordering details. Well constructed and lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: R. Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty amazing for the price, very sturdy and easy to set up, would buy every color available if I could
customer_reviews.author: patrick maellaro

customer_reviews.title: pro quality
customer_reviews.text: stakes into the ground so the wind won't blow it away. the chains are solid metal, as opposed to the nickle plated plastic a lot of other (cheaper) baskets have. pro quality.
customer_reviews.author: JiG

customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this target! It’s lightweight but sturdy. Quality material and build. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ryry

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with the compactness for travel
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with the compactness for travel. It comes with a bag and it's not too heavy. The price was fair, but varied depending on color, which seemed odd. It has stood up to the weather fairly well having been outside for two years straight. Only slight discoloration and minor rusting. The legs are not adjustable, however, which makes it less than ideal for uneven terrain.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob cumby

customer_reviews.title: It works good but doesn't stand up against wind very well
customer_reviews.text: It works good but doesn't stand up against wind very well. Great for traveling and an absolute breeze to setup and break down.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as an Easter gift for the folks and we had a blast playing all day outside in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: great net
customer_reviews.text: surprise for hubby's bday and he loves it. very easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.author: 2020musthave

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Best practice basket on the market. Very easy to use come assembled and read to play. Been playing disc golf for a couple years now and disc catcher is a great brand for on the go for Indoor and outdoor putting practice.
customer_reviews.author: William Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great first impressions
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I have been disc golf for around 3 years and this will really help my game. Came fully assembled and ready to go right out of the box. Arrived in no time and packaging was in good condition. I have only had the chance to use it once but can't wait to practice in my backyard on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, folds up nicely to get back into the bag. I was told that the chains can rust easily, so just make sure it stays away from water.
customer_reviews.author: samuel howard

customer_reviews.title: perfect for quarantine fun
customer_reviews.text: Great to take and use anywhere, even your back yard for some putting practice.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my son to haul around and easily set up to play Frisbee golf with friends. He loves it! Nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: ewynkoop

customer_reviews.title: My husband is hooked!
customer_reviews.text: Works well if you bring it in and out, we don't leave it outside all the time, it folds up nicely and doesn't require too much space to store. Fun family sport.
customer_reviews.author: South Alabama

customer_reviews.title: Great portable disc golf basket
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my brother-in-law for his birthday amd he was so thrilled that he went and set it up in the middle of a snow storm just so he could putt in his back yard. He said it set up really quickly and very easily and came down in the same manner.
customer_reviews.author: A. NonAmous

customer_reviews.title: Great travel basket
customer_reviews.text: I use it in the backyard to practice puts. In the spring, summer and fall I keep it in the trunk that way can practice puts anywhere, beach, lake, cooks outs ect. I set it up at my Mothers house for a cook out and it was a big hit with the kids, now any cook out or family gathering I go to the kids always ask if I have it with me.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Time to throw!
customer_reviews.text: Set the basket up and got some putting done in my garage, to cold outside, great basket! I'm gonna add some chains! Gave it four stars because a couple of the carabiners that attach the chains are bent and I can't close them, not the sellers fault, innova must not have the best quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Bartosiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Works for practice
customer_reviews.text: Harder to take down and set up then I expected
customer_reviews.author: Flying

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, so much fun in our backyard. Really sturdy and well made - stands up to bad weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn WN

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and portable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to travel with. Basically two folding chairs stacked on top of each other in weight and size. Pops up and down easily and easy to get back in bag with zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but portable
customer_reviews.text: Worth a little more to have something to easily portable. Very sturdy but light enough to carry around. Discs hit like a regular chain basket.
customer_reviews.author: KATE

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Like how can grab it & go anywhere. Folds p easy.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Better Than I expected
customer_reviews.text: There aren't many videos of this basket on youtube, but all of the reviews I read were pretty positive. I got my money's worth the first day I opened the box and am very happy with my purchase. Not one spit-out either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my discing husband. Its perfect to take to parks that don't have baskets set up. Also perfect for the backyard to practice in. Its super light and easy to set up and take down. Well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: g david

customer_reviews.title: Practice time!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Light weight, but built such that the weight is in the bottom so it is stable.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron J Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight portable basket
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple of weeks now and can't get enough of it! Mine is the blue model and is all that it claims to be. Have had many hours of enjoyment by myself and others with this portable basket. Thinking of ordering another one in yellow soon :)
customer_reviews.author: FishHead420

customer_reviews.title: Portable and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this basket and seems to be exactly what I was expecting! Very easy to open and close. Catches discs well and really is a great option especially considering you can take it anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great target for some backyard practice or party games.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight target that is easy to set up and break down in less than 1 minute. The carrying bag is well-made and packs up well. The chains are sturdy and very close in function to a standard course target. It comes with some metal stakes to hold down the legs, but I haven't needed to use them even on windy days.
customer_reviews.author: JH DMD

customer_reviews.title: A good deal.
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I expected from Innova. Portable, sturdy and priced well.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Miller

customer_reviews.title: Innova Champion Discs DISCatcher Traveler
customer_reviews.text: Took this camping and out of all the games we took, this one was by far the best to play. There was always a line waiting to get in on the game.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Dubois

customer_reviews.title: Portable and Easy Set Up
customer_reviews.text: These are great. We can take them anywhere, set them up quickly & easily, and have lots of fun. My family uses them in the yard and at the park! No problem at all!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Loved it..
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday gift for my brother in law who loves to go disc golfing and he was incredibly happy with it. He uses it everyday and enjoys it just as much as going to the professional places!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Love the catcher, fun game.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered yellow, received orange. It was not a big enough issue as we did not have an orange one yet, so we just kept it. Love the quality. Would have been a 5 star rating had we received the color we ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Sledge

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Travel Basket for Disc Golf
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!! We took it traveling and it was a breeze to set up and tear down. The yellow makes it really visible from far away, and the double chains play very close to the installed baskets on the course. Highly recommend - thanks, Innova!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Portability!
customer_reviews.text: My son is getting ready to head to college and I loved the portability of this. He was very excited to get this as a Christmas gift for those times he just wanted some extra practice but couldn't go to a course.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Good value and easy transport
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and carry. There are only 12 chains which can allow discs to fly through. For the weight though, it is a good deal. my son often carries it up to the park a 1/4 mile away. The only drawback is that the rings on the legs have sharp corners... So my son has been putting it upside down in the carry case to prevent tears.
customer_reviews.author: CIFmom

customer_reviews.title: This is a great idea for disc golfers who don't live near a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea for disc golfers who don't live near a disc golf course. It has held up to the Wyoming wind.
customer_reviews.author: P & J

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we hoped for and easy to put up and take down. It has traveled with us several times and is both sturdy and portable which is not always the case. Happy with our purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic disc goal!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic disc goal! We can’t wait to use this to practice throwing in our yard. So easy to put up and take down. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, easy to take down once you get familiar with it
customer_reviews.author: Casey Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed my neighbors one about 6 weeks ago, my friends and I had a lot of fun with it. It's even fun for people who normally don't disc golf.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Lofberg

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it. it catches every disc that hits the ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it. it catches every disc that hits the chains. Ive never had to use the stakes, it's sturdy enough to stay up without them. its super easy to set up and take down and slip into the carrying case. Super happy I went with this model.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott & Eva

customer_reviews.title: Great basket -- folds up and fits in the trunk ...
customer_reviews.text: Great basket -- folds up and fits in the trunk perfectly. Still had enough chains to catch reliably but is also light enough to take where ever.
customer_reviews.author: Sanaru02

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Set this up in the backyard. Very sturdy, good quality, and the chains catch the discs consistently well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T Wood

customer_reviews.title: I love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: It came faster than exchange date and it’s huge. My husband will love this for his bday
customer_reviews.author: cheyenne hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: We use this basket in the backyard daily, on any and all outdoor road trips, family get together's, and really anytime I have an excuse to bring it. Easily folds up and fits good in the carrier bag. Recommend for all Frisbee golf players, great for beginners and experienced players.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis

customer_reviews.title: This was a great gift - we've taken it around to a few ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift - we've taken it around to a few holiday celebrations and everyone has had a lot of fun with it. It took us a while to figure out how to extend the cage all the way, but we did and now it's perfect! I really like how portable it is.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Built well. A tiny bit flimsy, but holds up well to use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D.

customer_reviews.title: Bought it. Don't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing . My friend and I bought this item to pursue our goal of becoming pro in disc golf. This item is amazing because we literally set it up anywhere and play whether it is practicing on our putting or getting some distance shots we use it almost everyday and cannot be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel12345

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to setup and takedown
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to setup and takedown. Looks "thin" but catches more discs than a standard metal basket since the fabric is soft :) Baskets that catch more discs get good reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product! Bought it for my son in college ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Product! Bought it for my son in college - we played it in the backyard over the Christmas Holiday. Lots of Fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kateeri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much stays in the car and has came in handy numerous times, freaking love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Wilkey

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, easy to use and nicely portable in its case as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: smerritt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. We bought it as a birthday present for our 20 year old son, and we were all impressed with the quality of build and sturdiness when playing. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: DMac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Son loved this gift and he is still using it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. A bit pricey but well constructed and fairly quick setup and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Lardog

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! Awesome discs catcher and nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Awesome discs catcher and nice quality. This beats the waiting in the disc golf course.Just pick a park and make your own course.
customer_reviews.author: TurboNely

customer_reviews.title: Such a Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I guess for the price I paid, I wasn't expecting it to be as nice quality as it is. Yes, even after reading all the reviews, I was still skeptical. This is very nice though. My son set it up in seconds, and hauled it off to the park behind our house moments later. It comes with stakes for the base, although it's pretty stable without them. As someone else suggested, I ordered yellow since it's highly visible. We may order blue and red though, so we can set up a course in the open space area of the park. :)
customer_reviews.author: debhibb

customer_reviews.title: Next best thing to going to a Frisbee Golf Park
customer_reviews.text: Love this portable target. Not too heavy and super durable. Great to be able to play with it and our toddler but with the convenience of taking it to any other park we go!
customer_reviews.author: makalevi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the yard and easy to pack up to take places!
customer_reviews.author: Christi Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had it for about a year -- I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would say its not super portable; the bag is 4' long and its ...
customer_reviews.text: Item had clearly been returned by another customer and then sent back out to me; I'm going to do the same, and someone else will surely get it after me! I would say its not super portable; the bag is 4' long and its awkward and heave to get out of its carry bag even as a 6'1" person. Seems durable enough, but portability is really the best part about it. If you want a semi permanent practice basket, you can get an all metal high quality PDGA Championship approved basket for the same amount.,
customer_reviews.author: Jesse W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product to have when you are on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Tobbie Schoening

customer_reviews.title: Great producr
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and take down as promised and very lightweight and portable Will definitely be going with me on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This basket is perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This basket is perfect for my needs. I was looking to get something primarily to practice putting, but that was portable enough to go with me camping, or a friends house or whatever. This basket is spot on. Collapses down in seconds and packs away like a camping chair. The only thing that would be nice on this is an inner set of chains. I find that some of my putts will hit the chains and occasionally slip right through and out of the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Lackofagoodname

customer_reviews.title: Great portable short game practice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when it was $89.99 with free shipping, and it has paid for itself. I use it all the time and it absolutely had improved my putting and approach. There are 6 inner and 6 outer chains, they catch discs pretty well, however not as well as a higher-end basket. Nonetheless, this is a great target that is very portable at 15 lbs. I love that I can easily set this up in a field or in the forest and set up my own custom holes. It takes only 5-10 seconds to set up or take down. This is a fantastic practice target for a backyard or garage, and is perfect to take anywhere you want to practice.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: my son loves it! very portable and sets up ...
customer_reviews.text: my son loves it! very portable and sets up in 2 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: krgreen

customer_reviews.title: but I love it, and has helped me improve my putting ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems a bit more generous than a normal basket, but I love it, and has helped me improve my putting big time.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Bosco

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Basket is defective, the top hangs crooked and it looks like crap because of this. Apparently this is an issue with a lot of these. Beware if you buy one of these check for this when you unbox and return it if it's like mine was.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good but not the same as the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for travel and to practice putting in my yard. For those 2 applications it's perfect. VERY easy to put up and take down. My only complaint is this is FAR more forgiving than a real basket.
customer_reviews.author: J. Howe

customer_reviews.title: May not be official but is perfect for every occasion!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing unit fast dilvery and my son was amazed by how wonderful and easy this thing was to setup and use.
customer_reviews.author: Budd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome goal been using it every day since we got ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome goal been using it every day since we got it. Gave it five stars because unlike the goal itself the bag it comes with is cheaply made and is already tearing out. You would figure for the price and quality of the goal the bag would be made out of heavy-duty material? The carrier is cheap thin non reinforced nylon. We are probably going to use an old tent bag or something to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Headhunter 12

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: don't have a DG park near you? got a bunch of open field? this is definitely the solution. it folds up and goes into it's bag fairly easily and quickly so any park near you can become a dg park
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: It is very light and easy to setup so it's great for something to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: It works alright. It is very light and easy to setup so it's great for something to keep in the trunk for some quick practice. The DGA Mach light is the portable I prefer after using both tough. It is about 18 pounds heaver, but feels and looks more realistic to me. But! if it's lightweight and ease of use you are looking for the DISCatcher is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Targus

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE our Discatcher
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our Discatcher! It works so well and is easy for us to take to the park or set up in our yard. Its not too heavy but it is sturdy. This was one of our best disc golf purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Keeley

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: It is a quality piece of equipment. The price was right and it was delivered post haste. It is also attrative. The only downside is that the discs aren't dropping into the basket as often as I would like but I have a feeling it is not the catcher's fault. I have the utmost confidence that whenever I order merchandise form Amazon it is top quality, reasonably price and delivered promptly. Thanks for making life so simple. Mark G White
customer_reviews.author: Mark G White

customer_reviews.title: My Opinion, that's all...
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical,The outside of the box was showing a red catcher and I ordered a yellow one. When I opened it up, it was yellow. I immediately pulled it out of the bag and I set it up very quickly. The top was a little tilted but who gives a crap. I broke it down and was able to put it in it's bag with no problem at all. It was all good. I will be using it this coming weekend at the park. The reason I gave it a 4 star rating was as I left it set up for awhile, The smell of the new product material was very powerful in my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Scoop

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for practice in the yard as well as set up for new fun holes or to try new obstacles. I give it a 4 star because It was a hair more pricey on Amazon than other places.
customer_reviews.author: lee

product_meta.title: Innova DISCatcher Traveler Target – Portable, Lightweight Disc Golf Basket, Colors May Vary
product_meta.description:
The DISCatcher Traveler is ready to go wherever your disc golf adventures take you. With a lightweight, portable design, it sets up with ease and can be taken down in a breeze.

While the Traveler is not intended for permanent outdoor installation, it’s a great temporary solution for backyard putting practice. Set up your target in a single step and add the removable flag for easy visibility and wind direction indication.

Choose from three eye-catching colors – yellow, red and blue – subject to availability. Order your DISCatcher Traveler today and practice disc golfing wherever you go.

About Innova Disc Golf
INNOVA was created in 1983 to meet the growing equipment needs of disc golfers. In fact, we created the very first disc designed specifically for Disc Golf that same year. Today, INNOVA is the most popular and comprehensive line of golf discs. We offer discs for all skill levels and are constantly making product improvements and design innovations to help keep INNOVA at number one.
feature_bullets: SIMPLE TRANSPORT & SET UP: Comes with matching tote bag for quick transportation and storage; Easy one-action set up
STURDY DESIGN: 12 steel chains help better mimic a permanent target; Five legs create a wide, solid base; Anchor rings and stakes help secure on uneven surfaces and windy days
LIGHTWEIGHT: Weighs just 15 pounds; Our lightest portable target
MESH FABRIC: Extra wide basket tray is made of lightweight, durable, quick-drying mesh; Designed to withstand wind and weather
PORTABLE: Perfect for camping, trips to the beach, adventures in the mountains or on a trip to the park; Also great for schools, churches, and youth camps
